data.text: @DomIgnacio We are sorry if you are having a hard time to connect with our live chat agent Physics. You may kindly accomplish our Guest Feedback Form thru this link https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc and we will respond to you through the email you provided.

@preciousxhang Hi Jewell. Some of our flights still operate as scheduled. In case of cancelation, a notification will be sent via email. For quick checking on real time status of your flight, you can use this link https://t.co/n8RpsOcAwS.

@jeprox_ Hi jepe. Some of our flights still operate as scheduled. In case of cancelation, a notification will be sent via email. For quick checking on real time status of your flight, you can use this link https://t.co/n8RpsOcAwS.

@west23b Hi rick! No promo code. Simply go to https://t.co/0v117OwS0w to select your travel dates and destination, and follow the steps from there. Fares are subject to availability. First come first served basis. Hope to see you on board soon!

Be a MyCebuPacific member and enjoy the benefits of Manage Booking! View your schedules, rebook flights, and update your details. You can purchase more seats, meals, bags and other add-ons, even flight insurance! 
 
Sign up for a MyCebuPacific account at https://t.co/KrJafvyLuz https://t.co/Z0Wkp4DxIH

@busrayilld Hi Busra. Regrets but we are a point-to-point carrier, focused on flying you to your destination on our network. If you have other flight, you have to check in again with your baggage with other airline.

data.text: @chocstogo_ Hi Aim yell 🎀. We do collect change fee prior pandemic. As consideration, we have temporarily removed change fee before if passenger will be rebooking his flight. Terms & conditions are subject to change. If you will rebook now, change fee & fare difference will be collected.

@xianmanuel We regret that you feel that way Christian. We encourage you to message us via Charlie the chatbot thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK, & ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Or, here: (https://t.co/7yR2XSIMwc) and we will respond to you through the email you provided.
@chocstogo_ Hi Aim yell 🎀. Passengers can rebook until two (2) hours before flight departure time via Manage Booking online. Subject to a change fee and fare difference.

@kentopherr We sincerely apologize for this inconvenience Kent. We may delay any flight where we reasonably consider this to be justified by circumstances beyond our control or for reasons of safety and security. Please take care.
@Mrieax Hi, Mrieax!  You may check on our existing promotional fares in our website https://t.co/wngAzjsY1k. See you on-board!

@HitzLeigh_meow Hi there! For a better CEB customer experience, we're moving all of our chat engagements here: https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi. Click on the link and start chatting with Charlie the Chatbot and our live agents! We'll wait for you there, Thanks!

@jamiebauza Hi Jamie! Is this a roundtrip flight? If so, please ensure to rebook first the return flight then followed by the outbound flight so the system will display available schedules beyond the mentioned date. Thank you

@project0726 Hi u well¿. Barangay ID and Voter's ID can be accepted at check-in for domestic flight as long as it is valid with photo, date of birth and signature. Remember, all documents/ IDs presented are subject to airports discretion and profiling. Stay safe!

@project0726 Hi u well¿. Valid ID we accept are ID cards which reflects on its face the name, picture, date of birth, and nationality of the guest checking-in. Valid ID includes Company or School ID, passport, or govt-issued ID. SSS, GSIS, Driver’s License, UMID, PRC ID, PWD or OSCA.

data.text: @knittingcraft60 Hi celeste. Plants / seedlings are allowed in your checked baggage as long as it fits the size limitation based on our baggage rules. Please make sure to check the rules and regulations of your destination country / city. Please secure a quarantine permit as well.

data.text: @HitStrong I'm sorry to hear about this experience BisdakDad. We will help you look into it. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.
@GalenoTheresa Hi Maria Theresa! You may check and search for the lowest fare for your preferred flight and schedule thru our website at https://t.co/kPgrcWBdZU . Hope to see you on board soon!
@aaronsumulong I'm sorry to hear this Aaron. I'll let your case handler know that you reached out again so that we can send you an update. Please expect an email from us soon.
@kimatilano Hi krispy kim! Our agents are currently working on other requests at the moment. Rest assured that agents will be in touch with you as soon as we can thru https://t.co/GI0vBw2OWK.

data.text: @aspensanez Hi ASPEN. We will help you look into it. For assistance and the security of your personal information, you may send the details of your concern thru: https://t.co/GI0vBw3mMi and ask Charlie to connect you to a live chat agent. Stay safe.
@BreadIMake You're most welcome Millhouse! Please take care!

@AnotherMrsOh Hi 𝓞𝓱 𝓐𝓷𝓼𝓱𝓮𝓻𝓲𝓷𝓪! Gate Baggage Fee varies per sector. These are VAT-inclusive rates:
Domestic: PHP 1,000; International - Short Haul: PHP 1,500; Long Haul: PHP 3,000. You may avail our CEB Prepaid Baggage up to two (2) hours before flight https://t.co/lXA1ChoAfE.

data.text: @kimatilano Hi krispy kim! As per checking, our website is up and running. In the meantime, you may do the following troubleshooting and then try again. -Clear your browser's cache & cookies -Use another device (e.g. laptop, desktop computer, etc.) -Try to use Google Chrome browser.
